Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: ~binhn : Isn't this proto what we're after here? https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/gitweb?p=fabric.git;a=blob;f=orderer/atomicbroadcast/ab.proto;h=e115680debf64c199dedcdc4f1ac0c258276b5bc;hb=refs/heads/feature/convergence

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: I may be remembering wrong, but I think Binh's ask here was to take care of the error codes that we return. (And I see a couple of comments along these lines in Gerrit.) Feel free to correct me if I'm wrong and anything more is needed here.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: If so, this is in review, per https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/2075/14/orderer/atomicbroadcast/ab.proto
